subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|禾|t1=[[grain]]|刀|t2=[[knife]]|ls=ic}} – to reap grain ({{zh-l|*禾}}) with a knife ({{zh-l|*刀}}).
